items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% relevance score in A/B testing
non_functional: Compliance with GDPR for user data handling

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user tracking in place; specifics of AI model type and training data not provided.
